UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Shorter Antibacterial Peptide Having High Selectivity for E. coli Membranes and Low Potential for Inducing Resistance.
Literature.Author: Barreto-Santamaría A, Rivera ZJ, García JE, Curtidor H, Patarroyo ME, Patarroyo MA, Arévalo-Pinzón G
